item.description:
Well it's here at last...the end of one year and the beginning of another! We are celebrating with a farewell dinner (to 2010) at Cava Restaurant in Southington.

Don't sit home alone on New Year's Eve come out and share a wonderful meal with us. This fine establishment, while offering superb selections of all types, specializes in fine Italian cuisine. The interior is reminiscent of an Italian villa, and the furnishings and decor is beautifully appointed. You will believe you are in an Italian home sharing dinner with family and friends.

So come on out and join us for the meal...the friendship ...the laughter. Cava welcomes you and so do we!

We begin with cocktails at 9pm followed by our sumptuous dinner and dessert and then a midnight toast to the New Year! A lovely evening of elegance...dress for the occasion!

* This is a cross post with Eat, Laugh and Be Merry in West Hartford and also with Steppin' Out -A Social Group.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or Chuck or the Meetup Sign...

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Let's Bring The Year To A Close At CAVA's...
